bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Reporting Field Failure Data for Power Circuit Breakers
IEEE Recommended Practice for Reporting Field Failure Data for Power Circuit Breakers

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A format is presented that provides a concise and meaningful method for recording pertinent information on power circuit breaker field failures. It is recommended that this format be utilized in record keeping and directing corrective action to improve field reliability of power circuit breakers.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
